prompt:

responses.gpt4: Thank you for providing all this information, Mr. Valenzuela. I am triggering a GREEN kickout for diarrhea and will pass this information to your care team at O'Connor Hospital for review and further evaluation. I'll call you again the day before your procedure. In the meantime, please keep track of any new symptoms or changes.
responses.our_model: Thank you for sharing this information, Mr. Valenzuela. I'm going to note down your responses for your care team to review. They may want to discuss this further with you. Now, let's move on to discussing your upcoming colonoscopy. Are you aware of the preparation steps involved?
